Name: Aura of Terror
Description: Aura 2. Foes in the aura are pacified+ unless adjacent to an ally.

Name: Aura of Terror 2
Description: Aura 2. Foes in the aura are pacified+ unless adjacent to an ally. Bloodied foes also have +1 curse and attacks and saves.

Name: Aura of Terror 3
Description: Aura 2. Foes in the aura have the following effects applied.

ListedItems.Description: Pacified+ unless adjacent to an ally
Bloodied foes also have +1 curse and attacks and saves.
Bloodied foes must save before entering any space in the aura during their turn. On a failed save, they cannot move into the aura by any means until the end of their turn.

Actions.Name: Devour
Actions.Description: The [name] devours and absorbs an adjacent bloodied demon, destroying it permanently and curing itself. They then gain +1 action for all their turns for the rest of combat, starting with this one.

ListedItems.Description: Can also be used as Devour Natal:

ExtraActions.Name: Devour Natal
ExtraActions.Description: The [name] may Devour an adjacent Natal as a free action, destroying it and giving them +1 action for this turn only. A demon can only use Devour or Devour Natal in the same turn, and not both.

Name: Disgorge
Description: Whenever the [name] loses all vigor, create a natal in range 2.

Name: Engorge
Description: Becomes unstoppable if it devours another non-natal demon.

Name: Engorge 2
Description: If the [name] devours another non-natal demon, it becomes unstoppable and gains bonus damage on all abilities for the rest of combat.

Name: Engorge 3
Description: If the [name] devours another non-natal demon, it gains the following for the rest of combat.

ListedItems.Description: Increase size to 2. Other characters in the [name]'s area when its size are increased are removed and placed adjacent to the [name].

Name: Hurl Body
Description: When the [name] devours another demon or a natal, it uses its prey's leftover body as a weapon, hurling it at foes. A foe in range 4 of the [name] becomes weakened and takes 4 damage if devour was used, or just 2 damage if devour natal was used.

Name: Last Revenge
Description: When defeated (not devoured), explodes in a medium blast area effect centered on it. Non-demons in the area take [D]+[fray], then summon 2 Natals in free spaces in the area.

Name: Legion
Description: Fights with demons always include at least one Natal mob. Some demon abilities will add or remove to this mob, even if there are no members of the mob left.

Name: Void Prowler
Description: [name]s can create void rifts, which are 1 space pit terrain effects with the following features:

ListedItems.Description: Foes inside void rifts are blinded+.
Demons inside void rifts have evasion and ignore movement penalties when entering or exiting a rift space.
[name]s can treat any two void rifts as adjacent spaces when moving, teleporting when they move between them. However, they can only teleport this way once a turn.

Name: Void Prowler 2
Description: [name]s can create void rifts, which are 1 space pit terrain effects with the following features:

ListedItems.Description: Foes inside void rifts are blinded+.
Demons inside void rifts have evasion and ignore movement penalties when entering or exiting a rift space.
[name]s can treat any two void rifts as adjacent spaces when moving, teleporting when they move between them. However, they can only teleport this way once a turn.
Rifts are dangerous terrain for foes.

Name: Void Prowler 3
Description: [name]s can create void rifts, which are 1 space pit terrain effects with the following features:

ListedItems.Description: Foes inside void rifts are blinded+.
Demons inside void rifts have evasion and ignore movement penalties when entering or exiting a rift space.
[name]s can treat any two void rifts as adjacent spaces when moving, teleporting when they move between them. However, they can only teleport this way once a turn.
Rifts are dangerous terrain for foes.
[name]s gain stealth+ while adjacent to void rifts.
